question:
Consider the following statements about the term BCRLIP, sometimes seen in news:
  1. It is a project that aims to promote the development of a sustainable biomass energy production in India
  2. This project is receiving assistance in the form of a loan from World Bank
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u>. BCRLIP stands for â€œBiodiversity Conservation and Rural Livelihood Improvement Project. It aims at conserving Biodiversity in selected landscapes, including wildlife protected areas while improving rural livelihood through participatory approaches. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. BCRILP has received assistance in the form of loan from World Bank. Some of the participatory approaches adopted for biodiversity conservation include Joint Forest Management (JFM) and eco-development. The project intends to build on these models and expand lessons to other globally significant sites in the country to strengthen linkages between conservation and improving livelihoods of local communities.
